Welcome to the Nomodeco.py Documentation
========================================

Nomodeco.py is a open-source python package and provides an algorithm for the automatic normal mode decomposition.

.. note::
   This project is under active development.

   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents:

   inst
